data.title: Vanessa Marcil Files for Divorce From Carmine Giovinazzo
data.meta_description: Vanessa Marcil and her CSI: NY actor hubby, Carmine Giovinazzo, have called it quits after two years of marriage and are citing "irreconcilable differences" as
data.text:
Vanessa Marcil and her CSI: NY actor hubby, Carmine Giovinazzo, have called it quits after two years of marriage and are citing "irreconcilable differences" as the reason for the split.

OK! GALLERY: MEGAN FOX & HER HUSBAND BRIAN AUSTIN GREEN SHOP FOR THE HOLIDAYS IN HOLLYWOOD

Vanessa is perhaps most famous for her roles on Beverly Hills, 90210 and Las Vegas along with her high-profile relationship with Brian Austin Green and marriage to Corey Feldman from 1989 to 1993.

Vanessa and Brian are parents to a son, Kassius, who was born in March of 2002.

Back in December, Carmine hopped on Vanessa's Twitter and wrote that the couple had endured their second miscarriage.

OK! GALLERY: MEGAN FOX KEEPS BRIAN AUSTIN GREEN CLOSE WHILE FILMING THE DICTATOR IN NYC

"V has had a miscarriage. our second one this year. thanx for the love and prayers..............CDG"

Hilariously, Vanessa is known to deny her marriage to Corey (even though Nevada marriage records indicate otherwise) and even told Maxim back in June of 2005 that she never wed the actor and he was "just a kid I did drugs with when I was a teenager."
